title: MD
biography: Sharon Ruth Lewin is an Australian infectious diseases expert who is the inaugural Director of The Peter Doherty Institute for Infection and Immunity and the Cumming Global Centre for Pandemic Therapeutics. She is also a Melbourne Laureate Professor of Medicine at The University of Melbourne, and the immediate past president of the International AIDS Society (IAS).
aiSummary: Sharon Lewin is a virology specialist with an H-index of 84 at Doherty Institute (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, Nature Medicine, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
